Just a quick question or two :) 

I see several posts about having to find =
the Ark. I thought we knew where it was?? Legacy and Lord Elder were guardi=
ng it, although Legacy had left from there to help the Maximals and Autobot=
s at the old Maximal Base. 

I have no problem either way, I just need to k=
now before I have some of the other characters I have do things.

Sandy, if=
 you need me to, I can have Lord Elder give Rat Trap a call - he's another =
character I was temping before I left. While Elder won't know much about Tu=
scon, I'm sure after all this time RT has been gone, Elder will probably be=
 getting a bit nervous about him. It's up to you.  

Preston
